reviewText: Since I was a kid back in the 1950s, I have been interested in the old-time ballplayers.  I read books about them.  These DVDs give me an opportunity to actually see them on film.  Ken Burns did a great job finding all these archives.  I love every minute, and I'm sure I'll be watching these over and over.  There is really a large amount of film devoted to Babe Ruth in here.
